content.body: What a fun algorithm. It must have been invented before the <ol> element. https://html.spec.whatwg.org/multipage/canvas.html#serialisation-of-a-color
Domenic: hah, Hixie enjoyed that kind of style a bit too much
content.formatted_body: Domenic: hah, Hixie enjoyed that kind of style a bit too much

content.body: I'm reading through https://html.spec.whatwg.org/multipage/scripting.html#prepare-the-script-element and wondering. Do I understand correctly and step 31.11 (for fetching of the scripts) is done synchronously?
I mean, the fetching *starts* synchronously. The onComplete runs after the network gets back to us.
